welcome_message_body: Welcome to Umuarama, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant cultural scene, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Umuarama has to offer during your visit!

restaurants.name: Cantina da Sardinha
restaurants.description: Cantina da Sardinha is a seafood restaurant located in Umuarama.
restaurants.address: Av. Celson Garcia Cid, 3503, Umuarama, PR, 87501-090

restaurants.name: Restaurante Zeppelin
restaurants.description: Restaurante Zeppelin is a brazilian restaurant located in Umuarama.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
